meanings.definition: A large quantity or number of people or things.
meanings.sent1: The market was bustling with yauds of shoppers on the weekend.
meanings.sent2: She had a yauds of books stacked on her desk.
meanings.sent3: The yauds of colorful balloons filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent4: The field was covered in a yauds of wildflowers, creating a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent5: The yauds of stars in the night sky took her breath away.

meanings.sent1: He yauds his opinions at every meeting, making sure to be heard.
meanings.sent2: The coach yauds instructions to the players from the sidelines.
meanings.sent3: The parrot yauds in the middle of the night, startling everyone in the house.
meanings.sent4: The thunder yauds across the sky, announcing the arrival of a storm.
meanings.sent5: The singer yauds the high notes, captivating the audience with her powerful voice.

meanings.definition: A person who talks loudly and boastfully.
meanings.sent1: He is known as the yauds of the town, always bragging about his achievements.
meanings.sent2: The yauds at the party dominated the conversation with their stories.
meanings.sent3: The little boy pretended to be a yauds, boasting about his imaginary adventures.
meanings.sent4: She saw herself as a yauds in the mirror, practicing her confident speech.
meanings.sent5: The yauds in the group always had a story to tell, no matter the topic.
